text: Jola may refer to: * Jola people, an ethnic group of West Africa * Jola languages, a dialect continuum spoken in west Africa * Jola Jobst (1915–1952), German actress * Jola Sigmond (born 1943), Swedish architect * Jola (fungi), a genus of fungi in the family Auriculariaceae ==See also== * Johann Lamont, Scottish politician whose name is sometimes abbreviated as JoLa * Jolas (disambiguation) Category:Language and nationality disambiguation pages
title: Jola
